column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " My dad 's in there .
#Text=You 'll never see your father again .
#Text=" Korra says : " Where 's my father ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " On a ship headed to the Northern Tribe .
#Text=He 'll serve out his sentence there .
#Text=" Korra says : " Bring him back .
#Text=Or I 'm taking you out and the rest of your army .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Remember who you are .
#Text=As the Avatar , you can not threaten war .
#Text=You must remain neutral , or our tribes will never find unity .
#Text=" Korra says : " You do n't want unity .
#Text=You want power .
#Text=You 've always been jealous of my father , have n't you ?
#Text=You got him banished so you could become chief , and I bet it just killed you to learn he was the Avatar 's father .
#Text=No wonder you kept trying to take me away from him .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " All I 've ever wanted is to help you realize your destiny .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I do n't want your help anymore .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " If you start a war , the dark spirits will annihilate the South .
#Text=And even I will be powerless to stop them .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm done being manipulated by you .
#Text=You 're going to bring my father back , then you and your troops will return to the North .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " And why would I do that ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Because you still need me to open the Northern portal .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " No , I do n't .
#Text=You 've served your purpose .
#Text=" Mako says : " If we get to Varrick 's boat , we can still save your father .
#Text=" Korra says : " Let 's go .
#Text=" Northern soldier says : " You have a license for that animal ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Uh , you fellas seen a traveling circus come through here ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Zhu Li , do the thing .
#Text=" Excited man says : " That platypus bear is pooping money !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Where 's your dad ?
#Text=" Korra says : " On a ship headed north .
#Text=Think we can catch up to it ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Sure , once you get us past our friends from the North .
#Text="
